src:
TP-PKK Banda Aceh Bikin Kuliner Tanah Rencong Jadi Favorit Warga Kendari
02 Nov 2019, 23:26 by Syahril Ahmad



TP-PKK Banda Aceh Bikin Kuliner Tanah Rencong Jadi Favorit Warga Kendari



TP-PKK Banda Aceh Bikin Kuliner Tanah Rencong Jadi Favorit Warga Kendari


KBRN, Kendari : Tim Penggerak (TP) PKK Banda Aceh mencatatkan prestasi di tingkat Nasional melalui lomba cipta menu Beragam Bergizi Seimbang dan Aman (B2SA). Walau hanya meraih Juara Harapan III, namun ada penilaian juri yang membuat para ibu-ibu ini merasa senang. Bahwa masakan Aceh cocok di lidah warga Kendari, Sulawesi Tenggara.“Para juri memberikan apresiasi setelah mencicipi makanan kami," ujar Nurmiaty usai menerima trofi Juara Harapan III dari Ketua Dewan Juri Febrian Wicaksono pada ajang Lomba Cipta Menu B2SA Nasional di Lapangan MTQ Kota Kendari, Sulawesi Tenggara, Sabtu (2/11/2019).Lomba Cipta Menu B2SA Nasional ini digelar dalam rangka memperingati Hari Pangan Sedunia dan diikuti 34 Kabupaten/Kota seluruh Indonesia. TP PKK Banda Aceh tampil mewakili Provinsi Aceh pada event ini, didampingi pengurus PKK Provinsi Aceh dan dinas terkait.“Sebagai wakil Aceh, TP PKK Banda Aceh mendapatkan juara harapan tiga kategori olahan pangan lokal komersial. Terima kasih atas dukungan dan doanya,” ujar Nurmiaty AR.Karena kuliner khas Aceh banyak diminati pengunjung di ajang ini, Nurmiaty berharap tahun selanjutnya makanan khas Aceh mendapatkan apresiasi lebih baik lagi dan semakin dikenal warga nusantara, bahkan hingga mancanegara.“Lewat ajang ini kami berharap makanan khas Aceh semakin dikenal. Kami manfaatkan perlombaan ini sebagai ajang promosi, dengan harapan kuliner Aceh menjadi salah-satu daya tarik wisata dan dapat meningkatkan kesejahteraan warga kota,” pungkasnya.
text:
TP-PKK Banda Aceh Makes Tanah Rencong Culinary a Favorite of Kendari Residents
02 Nov 2019, 23:26 by Syahril Ahmad



TP-PKK Banda Aceh Makes Tanah Rencong Culinary a Favorite of Kendari Residents



TP-PKK Banda Aceh Makes Tanah Rencong Culinary a Favorite of Kendari Residents


KBRN, Kendari: Banda Aceh PKK Mover Team (TP) recorded achievements at the National level through a balanced and safe nutritionally diverse (B2SA) menu competition. Although only won the Champion of Hope III, but there are judges who make the judges feel happy. "The judges gave their appreciation after tasting our food," said Nurmiaty after receiving the Hope Champion Trophy III from the Chairperson of the Jury Board, Febrian Wicaksono, at the National B2SA Menu Copyright Contest at the MTQ Field in Kendari City, Southeast Sulawesi, Saturday (11/02/2019). The National B2SA Menu Copyright Competition was held to commemorate World Food Day and was joined by 34 Regencies / Cities throughout Indonesia TP Banda Aceh PKK appeared to represent Aceh Province at this event, accompanied by Provincial PKK administrators. "As a representative of Aceh, TP PKK Banda Aceh won three championship hopes in the category of local commercial food preparations. Thank you for your support and prayers," said Nurmiaty AR. Because Aceh's culinary specialties attracted many visitors at this event, Nurmiaty hopes then Aceh's special food gets better appreciation and is increasingly known by the citizens of the archipelago, even to foreign countries. "Through the event We hope that the specialties of Aceh will be more well-known. We take advantage of this competition as a promotional event, with the hope that Aceh's culinary will become one of the tourist attractions and can improve the welfare of city residents, "he concluded.
